Home » 37P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 13 Parittattika » 13.3 Paccayavāra » 13.3.1 Paccayānuloma » 13.3.1.2 Saṅkhyāvāra
Suddha
Parittattika
Paccayavāra
Paccayānuloma
Saṅkhyāvāra
Suddha
32.
1972Hetuyā sattarasa, ārammaṇe satta, adhipatiyā sattarasa, anantare satta, samanantare satta, sahajāte sattarasa, aññamaññe nava, nissaye sattarasa, upanissaye satta, purejāte satta, āsevane satta, kamme sattarasa, vipāke sattarasa, āhāre sattarasa, indriye jhāne magge sattarasa, sampayutte satta, vippayutte sattarasa, atthiyā sattarasa, natthiyā satta, vigate satta, avigate sattarasa (evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ)
1973Anulomaṃ.
